author: wn.com
title: Iran outraged by dividing al-Aqsa Mosque by occupying regime (Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR of Iran ) Foreign Ministry spokesperson on Sunday expressed outrage at dividing al-Aqsa Mosque by the occupying regime, saying Israel has no right to divide or occupy al-Aqsa Mosque. Marzieh Afkham
